Build¶

These scripts are all part of the general process of taking the raw data and publishing it through our database. The script initialize.py essentially runs each of these in order.

Models¶

Some utility classes

class contracts.lib.models.QueryBuilder¶

Build a document cloud query

add_term(term, value)¶

Add a term to the dictionary. If term is updated it will just re write the dictionary value

add_text(text)¶

Add a freetext component to the query (ex. “playground”)

get_query()¶

Translate the dictionary into a document cloud query

contracts.lib.models.get_contract_index_page(pageno)¶

Get a given page in the list of current contracts

contracts.lib.models.get_po_numbers_from_index_page(html)¶

Take an index page of contracts. Return the contract numbers

contracts.lib.models.valid_po(purchaseorderno)¶

A simple method to determine if this is a valid purchase order

Datamangement¶

Webapp¶
